The people who sustained, enabled, & profited from tat regime of terror tat existed in Ireland not so long ago, havenâ€™t gone away
They still want control over womenâ€™s bodies; they still act as apologists for horrendous abuse, & they still consider their morality 2 be god giving
They weaponised shame, and silence- they enslaved Irish women and made incubators of them. They sold their babies, and profited enormously from their forced servitude.

In the heart of Dublinâ€™s North Inner City- there is a 2 acre site that once contained a Magdalene Laundry. It was here, and in many other similar buildings throughout the State, that people like the one pictured here, would impose their morality on women. https://t.co/MmaeDZadsR
